name: Universal Toilet Flusher Replacement Kit, Fill Valve, 2-Inch Flapper, Toilet Handle Lever, Adjustable, Quiet, Easy to Install, Complete Toilet Parts Inside Tank Kit (Red, 1-Pack)
short_description: 【Universal Design】This toilet fill valve replacement kit fits most toilet models and brands. It features a US standard G15/16" inlet and an adjustable height, easily extending from 8 to 13 inches for a perfect fit

【Enhance Your Toilet's Performance】Fix slow filling, noisy, leaking, or running toilets with this toilet flush valve replacement kit. Experience quiet and rapid tank filling, dramatically boosting your toilet's overall efficiency

【Water-Saving Toilet Tank Parts】Customize the perfect flush with adjustable tank and bowl water level dials. The fill valve delivers the right amount of water to the tank, optimizing performance, saving water, and reducing your water bill

【Efficiently Prevents Leaks】The V-shaped silicone seal ring on the toilet fill valve ensures a tight seal. The durable, leak-proof toilet flapper is crafted from high-quality, corrosion-resistant rubber, offering both strength and flexibility. Its excellent sealing performance effectively eliminates water leakage issues

【Easy to Install】The float valve replacement kit is simple to install. Package includes: 1 Fill Valve, 1 2-Inch Flapper, and 1 Handle Replacement. Just remove the old parts and replace with the new ones for a quick DIY upgrade to your toilet flush

UNIVERSAL FIT: With its universal fit design, this economy kit is the perfect solution to your bathroom project

product_description: Get your bathroom back to being functional with the Plumb Pak Toilet Repair Kit. This repair kit includes everything you need to update and repair your toilet tank, including a float, float rod, flapper, ballcock, and refill tube. With its universal fit design, this economy kit is the perfect solution to your bathroom project. The flapper fits most flush valves for easy installation. The parts are designed for 8.5" tanks for compatibility with your toilet. For over 95 years, Plumb Pak & Plumb Pak have been manufacturing brass and plastic under sink repair parts, quarter turn valves, bath drains, toilet repair parts, and more. Now we bring a touch of elegance to your home with our designer collection, featuring Stylewise and Belanger. From shower fixtures to kitchen and bathroom faucets, Plumb Pak offers affordable beauty at a high standard of quality.

name: Toilet Fill Valve Replacement Kit - Universal Toilet Repair Kit Inside Tank Anti Siphon Height Adjustable, Leak-Proof Easy Install Fill Valve Replacement Kit for Toilet Tank
short_description: Universal Fill Valve Anti-Leak: WINONLY’s universal toilet valve kit features a standard G15/16" inlet, fitting most American toilets. It stops flush valve leaks, keeping your bathroom dry. The kit also resolves slow filling, loud noises, and performance issues. The anti-siphon fill valve ensures quick tank refills, enhancing overall toilet performance

Easy Installation Adjustable Height: Featuring a twist-lock mechanism, the WINONLY toilet valve kit allows for quick, tool-free installation. Adjust the float height easily between 10.2" and 13" to fit various tank sizes. The quick-lock nut simplifies repairs, making installation fast and hassle-free

Water Conservation Refill Tube: This kit includes a white refill tube with adjustable water levels and flow control. Use the dial on the hose to set your desired water volume, conserving water and reducing your bill. After flushing, the overflow tube efficiently refills the tank

Exceptional Durability: Made from durable, corrosion-resistant materials, the WINONLY toilet tank kit withstands up to 250,000 uses. It’s built to endure harsh bathroom conditions. The flush valve’s delay design ensures proper drainage by waiting for the flapper to close. Note: Tank height must exceed 10.2" and avoid using brushes or abrasive pads for cleaning

Wide Compatibility Tailored Service: WINONLY’s flush valve kit is compatible with most American standard toilets, making it a popular choice. Enjoy our 24-hour support with professional guidance for a seamless purchase experience. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us anytime for assistance

name: Plumb Craft Complete Toilet Repair Kit (34 pieces)
short_description: Complete Package - Contains all the parts needed to completely upgrade toilet while saving up to 38% more water.
Adjustable - Toilet fill valve can be easily adjusted from 8” to 13” to fit most toilets and available with 2” flapper.
Fits American Standard, Kohler and other toilets.
Easy to Install - Detailed step-by-step instructions included with helpful graphics and suggested helpful tools for a successful installation.

Pack Includes: (1) flush valve, (1) tank-to-bowl gasket, (3) 5/16" x 3" corrosion-resistant bolts, (6) corrosion-resistant washers, (6) rubber washers, (3) hex nuts, (3) wing nuts, (1) adjustable fill valve assembly, (1) flexible refill tube with clip, (7) water-saving caps, (1) 2" toilet flapper with chain, (1) flush lever

Complete kit- each kit has all of the parts you need to completely upgrade your toilet, including fill valve, flush valve, tank-to-bowl gasket, bolts and washers, water saving caps, toilet flapper, and flus lever. Low water consumption–includes (7) color-coded water flow adjustment caps to adjust water savings by up to 40%. long lasting– all components constructed of advanced corrosion- resistant materials easy installation– a simple and easy to follow installation manual is included in every kit.
